name: places/ChIJYywg_mL2wokRlc1L71lEv78
adrFormatAddress: 3582 Broadway, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Im visiting the city and needed to get my prescription glasses replaced and this place seemed nice and I wanted to go somewhere where it was close by and choose this but let me tell you don’t be fooled but their looks, yes it may seem nice inside and the staff are friendly but theres only one doctor and he’s a bit scary and when I wanted to get my yearly routine I decided to cancel because they only had one doctor, i wasn’t comfortable with that. I got my glasses but it was a hassle, when I was able to get them it came scratched up on the same day I got them, so I called and they told me I had to come in the next day so they can see the lenses, they proceeded to tell me it would take 4-5 business days for them to order new glasses and I waited and I got my glasses, I also asked for sanitizing wipes because other peoples hands were touching my glasses and they didn’t carry sanitizing equipment?!

text.text: Im visiting the city and needed to get my prescription glasses replaced and this place seemed nice and I wanted to go somewhere where it was close by and choose this but let me tell you don’t be fooled but their looks, yes it may seem nice inside and the staff are friendly but theres only one doctor and he’s a bit scary and when I wanted to get my yearly routine I decided to cancel because they only had one doctor, i wasn’t comfortable with that. I got my glasses but it was a hassle, when I was able to get them it came scratched up on the same day I got them, so I called and they told me I had to come in the next day so they can see the lenses, they proceeded to tell me it would take 4-5 business days for them to order new glasses and I waited and I got my glasses, I also asked for sanitizing wipes because other peoples hands were touching my glasses and they didn’t carry sanitizing equipment?!

originalText.text: I cannot recommend enough this place. As a foreigner I walked into the center and they took me in charge on a saturday morning for an emergency. I was pretty panicked and stressed because nothing is more important than eyes. And they took me in charge. The place is so pretty and clean. The staff is so compassionate, kind and helpful. I can't thank them enough for taking care of me, and healing my eye. Today I came back here for a check up anf follow up even though it's 45 min from where I live. Just for the professionalism, expertise and kindness

text.text: I cannot recommend enough this place. As a foreigner I walked into the center and they took me in charge on a saturday morning for an emergency. originalText.text:
From Craig Anderson

Of all the centers regarding eye care, this is definitely my favorite. Been coming here since 2021. Props to the staff for being incredible kind, competent, and accommodating, including the doctor himself, Dr. Radetsky. Any questions or concerns and he's always prepared with answer.

Have to dock off 1 star due to the wait times. Outside of my very first visit, I've been there longer than I needed to. Today, I was there for a little under 2 hours. I hope they improve in this area, as I do want to continue coming to this location. Again, this place excels at everyhing else.

text.text:
From Craig Anderson

Of all the centers regarding eye care, this is definitely my favorite. Been coming here since 2021. Props to the staff for being incredible kind, competent, and accommodating, including the doctor himself, Dr. Radetsky. Any questions or concerns and he's always prepared with answer.

Have to dock off 1 star due to the wait times. Outside of my very first visit, I've been there longer than I needed to. Today, I was there for a little under 2 hours. I hope they improve in this area, as I do want to continue coming to this location. Again, this place excels at everyhing else.

originalText.text: Excellent service and all the staff are very friendly. I went to replace my son's glasses without an appointment and in 15 minutes everything was ready... I just have to wait for them to call me to pick up the glasses, thanks ☺️

text.text: Excellent service and all the staff are very friendly. I went to replace my son's glasses without an appointment and in 15 minutes everything was ready... I just have to wait for them to call me to pick up the glasses, thanks ☺️

originalText.text: Such a great experience, doctor and staff are very kind and care. They went above and beyond for me even though I had no appointment and was in an emergency situation. Highly recommend and will be back to get my glasses done. A gem truly.
